Title: Requires certain landlords and property managers to provide notice to tenants on proper protocols for recycling
Summary: Requires landlords and property managers of public and private multifamily buildings in cities with a population of a million or more to provide notice to tenants on proper protocol for recycling including information on materials that are acceptable; requires the division of housing and community renewal to develop an example notice and make it available on its website for use by landlords and property managers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring certain landlords and property managers to provide notice to tenants on proper protocols for recycling
